Content.Text:
<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. <MYNAME>. I've got some
really great news for you today.
<PAGE>
My daughter has graduated from fashion
design school and has come back to live
here in town!
<PAGE>
She's going to be selling clothes from
the shop you built, so she wants to
thank you for it.
<PAGE>
Yuri. Speak up, dear.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, Yuri! I thought she'd come in with
me. Yuri, come in here!

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is <MYNAME>. Remember, from my
letters? Say hello.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, <MYNAME>. She's quite shy and
timid.
<PAGE>
This is actually her in a good mood.
Isn't that right, Yuri?

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Anyway. She's going to be working as a
<GREEN>tailor</GREEN> here in town. Come by and look at
some clothes some time!
<PAGE>
We'll leave you to get on with your day,
anyway. Come on Yuri.

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
